entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
